doc.field: Series H: Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford (Nellie)
Series H: Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford (Nellie)
Gardiner, Sarah Diodati: Bay Shore & New York, NY
Gardiner, Sarah Diodati: Bay Shore & New York, NY

9 Letters, 9 Envelopes with Postage and Seals, 3 Photographs
Addressed To: "Miss [Sarah Diodati] Gardiner, 3 East 82nd Street, New York, NY," "45 East 57th Street, New York, NY," "129 Whitney Avenue, New Haven, CT," "Hotel de France et Choiseul, 239 Rue St. Honore, Paris," [France], "Sagtikos Manor, Bay Shore, Long Island, NY," "The Barrel-in-the-Pines, Lakewood, NY," [Cousin of Cornelia Conway Felton Horsford]
Sent From: "Cornelia [Conway Felton] Horsford, Boston, MA," "27 Craigie Street," [Cambridge, MA], "Sylvester Manor, Shelter Island, NY"
In Reference To: Family / Friendship / Personal / Social / Travel; 3 B and W Wallet Photographs of Sylvester Manor Gardens, Grounds
60 Pages, Bound and Unbound
Printed and Handwritten in Ink
Measurements: 4.25" x 2.5" - 7" x 12"
Gardiner, Sarah Diodati: Bay Shore & New York, NY: 1885 January 18 - 1918 October 17
Gardiner, Sarah Diodati: Bay Shore & New York, NY: 1885 January 18 - 1918 October 17
